svg.style: background: #FFFFFF; background-color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:142.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/142.0" version="28.1.2" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram id="1" name="Use Case Absensi"> <mxGraphModel dx="925" dy="587" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="2000" pageHeight="2000" background="#FFFFFF" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="aktorAdmin" value="Admin" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="80" width="40" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aktorGuru" value="Guru" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="240" width="40" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="aktorSiswa" value="Siswa" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="400" width="40" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="systemBoundary" value="Sistem Absensi Siswa" style="shape=rectangle;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF;dashed=1;verticalAlign=top;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="50" width="500" height="500" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ucLogin" value="Login" style="ellipse;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="systemBoundary" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="20" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ucManageUser" value="Kelola Data Guru & Siswa" style="ellipse;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="systemBoundary" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="100" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ucInputAbsensi" value="Input Kehadiran" style="ellipse;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="systemBoundary" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="180" width="160" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ucRekap" value="Lihat Rekap & Laporan" style="ellipse;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="systemBoundary" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="260" width="160" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ucHistori" value="Lihat Histori Kehadiran" style="ellipse;strokeColor=#000000;fillColor=#FFFFFF" parent="systemBoundary" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="340" width="160" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relAdmin1" parent="1" source="aktorAdmin" target="ucLogin" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relAdmin2" parent="1" source="aktorAdmin" target="ucManageUser" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relGuru1" parent="1" source="aktorGuru" target="ucLogin" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relGuru2" parent="1" source="aktorGuru" target="ucInputAbsensi" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relGuru3" parent="1" source="aktorGuru" target="ucRekap" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relSiswa1" parent="1" source="aktorSiswa" target="ucLogin" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="relSiswa2" parent="1" source="aktorSiswa" target="ucHistori" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(237, 237, 237));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
